about_the_game:
NPCs: The Middle Class


This token pack contains 43 tokens. This pack contains an assortment of non player characters of middle class standing in a typical town.

This Token Pack includes:

  • Female Alchemist
  • Female Apple Picker
  • 2 Female Barmaids
  • 2 Female Drinkers
  • Female Duchess
  • 2 Female Grape Pickers
  • 2 Female Higher Scholars
  • Female Lamp Lighter
  • 2 Female Sleeping
  • 2 Female Merchants
  • Female Messenger
  • 2 Female Seamstresses
  • Female Teacher
  • Male Artist
  • Male Bartender
  • Male Carpenter
  • Male Chef
  • Male Cleric
  • Male Fish Merchant
  • Male Gem Smith
  • Male Green Merchant
  • Male Mage Cook
  • Male Mage Dishwasher
  • 2 Male Merchants
  • Male Middle Class Sleeping
  • Male Musician Drummer
  • Male Old Lantern Bearer
  • Male Old Merchant
  • Male Potato Peeler
  • Male Purple Cleric
  • Male Shop Merchant
  • Male Sleeping Man
  • Male Weapon Merchant
  • 2 Male Wounded

Released on March 26, 2017. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.2.2 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
